title: Glass
alt: I read in this one article that the breaking of electroweak symmetry is the reason we have SOULS. This guy with a degree said so!
transcript:
[Megan is singing, Cueball is staring at a glass of water on a table.]
Megan: EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE... Anything break?
Cueball: No, but the water in the glass turned to wine.[Cueball picks up glass]
Megan: Weird.
Cueball: No, wait. This is blood.Megan: Okay, physics, quit fucking with us.
Physics: You stop looking for the Higgs boson and we'll talk.
